subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The StrategyType definition is an abstract element definition that all concrete strategy defintions must extend.

The Metro runtime model defines a concrete component strategy under the namespace dpml:metro> that is used to define the resources, services, and internal composition of an object. A second concrete strategy defintion named resource (uder the dpml:depot namespace) is used by the Depot build system to define antlib loading criteria. If a foreign strategy element is declared the associated scheme is resolved buy locating a class implementing the org.w3c.dom.ls.LSResourceResolver service (via java.util.ServiceLoader). The runtime strategy handler will be resolved by reading a uri value from an attribute named handler. The uri is used to identify a plug-in part supporting the runtime handling of the foreign strategy.
